About me

I am a London based Junior Front-end Developer. I have a passion for creating fun, responsive, and dynamic websites, creating code that is readable, modular and organised. My approach is to start with a desktop-first design and media query my way to responsive mobile versions, with HTML, JavaScript, SASS, PHP, mySql, I also work with Javascript libraries React, GSAP and dabble with Three.js.

Problem solving

I approach each problem as a learning experience, identifying a complex problem, breaking it down into smaller components and solving it.

accessibility

Using HTML semantics to achieve web accessibility, and maximizing readability by selecting appropriate color contrasts and font family.

responsive

Creating pixel perfect layout allowing users to intuitively navigate through a website, with the use of media queries, CSS grid, and flexbox.

Fast

Cutting the load time of websites by utilizing strategies like lazy loading, using srcset for images, decided the image pixels in relation to the largest image size used on a webpage.

Projects

No.01 Login System using PHP

A prototype for the department of computer science allowing students and faculty to log into the departments intranet system, this includes a restricted administrator login to create new users. Login and registation validation carried out using PHP. Click to view Admin & User login details

View Code View Project

No.02 YouTube API

Current project, built with React, duplicating functionalities found on youtube, making api requests to retreive data for the most popular videos to include on the recommended videos section, search for videos, and play selected videos.

View Code View Project

No.03 My Portfolio Website

A Single page portfolio website with a single objective: to create a simple layout with two key sections, About me and Projects.
